page.title: 15Religion
page.content: The only place of worship is St. Michael & All Angels, Church of England, which is in the patronage of the Coltman Rogers family, Stanage Park. It is now a united benefice with Llanfair Waterdine and Bucknell, within the Clun group of parishes in the Clun Forest Deanery. The vicar is the Rev. Brian A. Gill of Bucknell Vicarage. The number on the Ecclesiastical Roll is 22. One service is held weekly with an average congregation of six. This number is considerably augmented when the other two parishes attend Stowe church for a joint service, about one per quarter.
